ComicInfo.Summary: If I Kill You -- I Die!: Bruce Banner reunites with an old classmate in gamma studies and the two cobble together a machine to end the menace of the Hulk. When Raoul uses the gammatron, it separates Bruce and the Hulk into two individual beings. Banner runs to Ross with the Hulk in hot pursuit and he decides that the only way to contain him is to merge once again with the jade giant.
ComicInfo.Tags: New Mexico,Herbert Josiah Weller,Desert State University,United States Army,Thunderbolt Ross,Glenn Talbot,Hulk,Betty Ross,Dr. Raoul Stoddard
ComicInfo.Title: If I Kill You -- I Die!
